data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 21,711 believers in the state of As Suways to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of As Suways, Egypt
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of As Suways, Egypt.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Over 86.87 percent of the people of As Suways are far from Jesus.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 424,014, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Fur people might believe through him.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of As Suways. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: the state of As Suways has (about) 21,711 people who know Jesus, 42,375 people who know about him culturally, and 424,014 people who are far from Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of As Suways, Egypt has a population of 488,100.

We estimate As Suways has 21,711 people who might know Jesus, 42,375 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 424,014 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 22 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 21,711 believers in As Suways, Egypt to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.
